https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nVbbHqdX5EDogcxQRYZkp2TILiU.jpg In a town where everyone believes in UFOs, a bus driver named Sam lives out his daydreams by making special radio programs for the passengers who ride his bus. A heartwarming story of a physically challenged but outgoing girl named Kate who falls in love with this timid but lovable bus driver. Au Revoir, UFO
